LanguageData.SiegfriedSiege_RepeatOrdersTooltip: Toggle whether or not Siegfried can give the same order as the current order.
LanguageData.SiegfriedSiege_MTBDaysOrdersTooltip: Sets the average number of days between Siegfried's orders.
LanguageData.SiegfriedSiege_BuildingDmgSettingTooltip: Sets how much Siegfried Siege multiples damage to buildings by, independent of any existing factors.
LanguageData.SiegfriedSiege_ConstructSettingTooltip: Sets how much Siegfried Siege multiplies construction speed.
LanguageData.SiegfriedSiege_HungerFactorTooltip: Sets how much hunger rate is multiplied by while combat is occuring.
LanguageData.SiegfriedSiege_CombatConstructEnableTool: Toggle an additional multiplier to construction speed that only applies and grows over time in the middle of combat, from 1x to the max value.
LanguageData.SiegfriedSiege_CombatConstructTimeToolti: Set how long a pawn must be in combat to receive the full combat construction speed multiplier.
LanguageData.SiegfriedSiege_CombatConstructSettingToo: Set the maximum combat construction speed multiplier a pawn gets after spending enough time in combat.
LanguageData.SiegfriedSiege_CombatMentalEnableTooltip: Toggle whether combat decreases pawn mental break threshold by a percentage.
LanguageData.SiegfriedSiege_CombatMentalMultTooltip: Set the mental threshold factor a pawn gets while in combat. Decreasing this makes it harder for pawns to suffer mental breaks.
